Get Ready for the ECML - launching

The East Coast Mainline (ECML), the first line in Harlonian National's railway network, will bring the City of Harlon closer to the Sealand region and the City of Victoria with HN's regional and intercity trains. There's more than just better connectivity, though - the ECML brings new, well-paid job opportunities. Why not become one of the first to operate the new line?

Learn more about the ECML || View ECML job opportunities
